predicate.note: Frames file for 'belong' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'own' and 'include'.

example.name: belong with
example.text: Even some members of the Old Guard, despite their current advantage, seem to be conceding that the future belongs with the New Guard.

example.name: belong on, less obvious group
example.text: You are so damn dumb that you don't belong on Wall Street.

example.name: belong to
example.text: This beat-up teddy bear belongs to John.

example.name: another belong to
example.text: John belongs to the local chapter of Deluded Self-Important Idiots Anonymous.
example.arg: the local chapter of Deluded Self-Important Idiots Anonymous.
